resources.string:
FAMILYLOOPED PRIVACY POLICY

FamilyLooped is committed to your right to privacy and takes your privacy very seriously. We have strict privacy policies and we strive to keep your personal information secure. Please note that this Privacy Policy only applies to the FamilyLooped Application and does not apply to any other websites, software, products or services.

 

What sort off information does the FamilyLooped App collect from me?

Information You Provide to Us: We may collect personally identifiable information from you as a condition to use the FamilyLooped App. Personal information to be collected includes information from your e-mail address and/or e-mail addresses/names off your connections.

 

Automatic Information: When you visit the website or download the application, you disclose certain information, such as your Internet Protocol (IP) address, the time of your visit, and possibly your location. FamilyLooped, like many other services, may record this basic information.

 

Photo’s: Familylooped provides every account of the monthly maximum storage off 1 gb. Photo’s older than a specific time(month or less) will be deleted from the server. Familylooped reserves the right to adjust the monthly maximum storage when necessary. No rights can be derived from the Familylooped app and photo’s that will be displayed in the app.

 

How and when does the FamilyLooped App use my information?

The information FamilyLooped collects is used to help us improve the App for users. It is only used for our business purposes. Occasionally, we may use the information we collect from you or the information you provide us, with to notify you about changes or updates to our products or services. With this information we may customize content available to you, change the layout of the user interfaces, and send you notifications.

 

How does FamilyLooped protect my information?

FamilyLooped takes precautions to insure that user information is kept private. We use reasonable measures to protect user information that is stored within our database, and we restrict access to user information to those employees who need access to perform their job functions, such as our customer service personnel and technical staff. Please note that no one can guarantee the security of all information submitted. Unauthorized entry or use, hardware or software failure, and other factors may compromise the security of user information at any time.

In addition, our business practices are reviewed periodically for compliance with policies and procedures governing the security and confidentiality of our information. Our business practices limit employee access to confidential information, and limit the use and disclosure of such information to authorized persons.

 

Can I see what information FamilyLooped has collected about me?

You can sign into your account to see any personally identifiable information we have stored, such as your name, email, address or contacts. You can also contact us by email to request to see this information.

By using the FamilyLooped App, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information as described above.

 

Familylooped reserves the right to claim a Familylooped e-mail address or change the privacy policy. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us

 

Effective Date: June 16, 2015

How FamilyLooped got started

Daddy, I want to share this with grandfather right now, can we?

The idea for FamilyLooped came to us when we started looking at our own family. When our first child was born we realized, once more, how important a close nit family is to us. His grandparents live in Spain and to make sure they had the chance of creating a strong bond we flew to Spain as soon as possible. Of course we were not able to do that every week and soon we had to rely on conversations by phone, email, photos and FaceTime . Despite the physical distance, we were very much involved in each other’s lives.We noticed how they enjoyed every picture, story and phone call. It felt amazing that we were able to include his grandparents in our sons life. No words can describe that feeling. After two years we were blessed with a wonderful baby girl. The process of traveling, calling and sending pictures started all over again.

We take a lot of pride in the way we try to keep our family connected and in the loop. But we also came to the realization that this is a luxury. That not everybody is able to do the same thing, even if they wanted to and value their family connection as much as we do.

We felt a necessity to create an application that would make it easier to keep loved ones in the loop. Especially elderly family members. When you take time out of your busy schedule to make sure that they are in your loop, it will not only make them feel loved but also keep them connected with their family. It keeps them from getting lonely in a society were loneliness is around every corner. Even though we don’t forget our elderly loved ones. In a world where time is of the essence it is very easy to feel forgotten.

We see it as our moral obligation to create a small part of the solution for this enormous problem. Taking just seconds to send a picture to the digital photo frame that is installed on your grandparents (or other family members) tablet is an easy and effective way to keep them in the loop and feel your love.

Download FamilyLooped and see how you can change someone’s life with just one click of your phone. Let them know that you are thinking of them and that they matter to you.

With kind regards FamilyLooped,

Joris de Kort

www.familylooped.com
